get.description: Lists all changeset using the provided options.

requestBody.description: The changeset that should be created.

get.description: Gets the changeset with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the changeset to retrieve.

delete.description: Deletes the changeset with the provided key. If a changeset with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the changeset to delete.

put.description:
Creates or replaces a changeset. If a changeset with the provided key exist it is replaced.
Otherwise a new changeset is created.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the changeset to update or create.

requestBody.description: The values of the created or replaced changeset.

get.description: Gets the changeset item for the specified content reference.

parameters.name: changeset
parameters.description: The changeset key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The content key

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The content version

delete.description: Deletes the specified changeset item from the changeset.

parameters.name: changeset
parameters.description: The changeset key

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The content key

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The content version

get.description:
Lists the available changeset items for the specified changeset using
the provided options.

parameters.name: changeset
parameters.description: The changeset key

parameters.name: changeset
parameters.description: The changeset key

parameters.name: changeset
parameters.description: The changeset key

parameters.name: contentKey
parameters.description: The content key

parameters.name: contentVersion
parameters.description: The content version

parameters.name: allowCreate
parameters.description: Indicates if a new changeset item should be created if it does not exist

parameters.name: skipValidation
parameters.description: Indicates that the content validation should be ignored.

requestBody.description: The content item that should be created.

get.description: Get shared metadata about the content instance with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content to retrieve metadata for.

parameters.name: allowDeleted
parameters.description: Indicates that metadata for a deleted content may be returned.

patch.description: Update an existing content item. If a content item with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item to patch.

requestBody.description: The values of the content item that should be updated.

delete.description: Deletes the content item with the provided key. If a content item with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item to delete.

parameters.name: permanent
parameters.description: Indicates that the content item should be permanently deleted immediately or if it should be soft deleted first.

get.description: Get the content path with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content path to retrieve.

get.description: List the content items located in a specific container.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content to retrieve items for.

parameters.name: contentTypes
parameters.description: Indicates which content types or base types to include in the list.

get.description: List the assets that belongs to a content instance.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content to retrieve assets for.

parameters.name: contentTypes
parameters.description: Indicates which content types or base types to include in the list.

post.description: Create a copy of the content item with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item to copy.

requestBody.description: Optional instructions for how to copy content.

post.description: Restore the deleted content item with the provided key. If a content item with the provided key is not deleted an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item to undelete.

get.description: List content versions based on the provided query options.

parameters.name: locales
parameters.description:
Indicates which content locales that should be listed. Use 'NEUTRAL' to include locale-neutral content.
Locale must be a valid IETF BCP-47 language tag.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Indicates which status content versions must have to be listed.

get.description: List versions of the content item with the provided key and the provided options.

parameters.name: locales
parameters.description:
Indicates which content locales that should be listed. Use 'NEUTRAL' to include locale-neutral content.
Locale must be a valid IETF BCP-47 language tag.

parameters.name: statuses
parameters.description: Indicates which status content versions must have to be listed.

post.description: Create a new version of a content item.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item for which a new content version should be created.

parameters.name: skipValidation
parameters.description: Indicates that the content validation should be ignored.

requestBody.description: The content version that should be created.

delete.description: Deletes the content item with the provided key. If a content item with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

get.description: Get the content item with the provided key and version.

patch.description: Update an existing content item. If a content item with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content item that should be updated.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the content that should be updated.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description: The locale of the content that should be updated.

parameters.name: skipValidation
parameters.description: Indicates that the content validation should be ignored.

requestBody.description: The content information that should be updated.

delete.description: Deletes the content item with the provided key. If a content item with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

get.description: List content types using the provided options.

parameters.name: forContainerType
parameters.description: Only include types that are available for creation under the provided container type

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description:
Indicates which sources should be included when listing content types.
Use All to include content types from all sources or
Default to include content types without a specific sources.

requestBody.description: The content type that should be created.

get.description: Get the content type with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content type to retrieve.

put.description:
Create or replace a content type. If a content type with the provided key exist it is replaced.
Otherwise a new content type is created.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content type to update or create.

parameters.name: ignoreDataLossWarnings
parameters.description: Update the content type even though the changes might result in data loss.

requestBody.description: The values of the created or replaced content type.

patch.description: Update an existing content type. If a content type with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content type to patch.

parameters.name: ignoreDataLossWarnings
parameters.description: Update the content type even though the changes might result in data loss.

requestBody.description: The values of the content type that should be updated.

delete.description: Deletes the content type with the provided key. If a content type with the provided key does not exist an error is returned.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the content type to delete.

get.description: List display templates using the provided options.

requestBody.description: The display template that should be created.

get.description: Get the display template with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the display template to retrieve.

put.summary: Create or replace a display template
put.description:
Create or replace a display template. If a display template with the provided key exist it is replaced.
Otherwise a new display template is created.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the display template to update or create.

requestBody.description: The values of the created or replaced display template.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the display template to patch.

requestBody.description: The values of the display template that should be updated.

delete.description: Deletes the display template with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the display template to delete.

post.description:
Request an access token. This endpoint only supports the 'client_credentials' grant type
and will only issue short-lived tokens.

get.description: Get a package job status.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the package job.

get.description: Export a data package.

parameters.name: includeReadOnly
parameters.description: Indicates if read-only resources should be included in the export data.

parameters.name: container
parameters.description: The key of the container content where new content items should be created under.

parameters.name: overwriteExistingContentItems
parameters.description:
Indicates if the existing content item in CMS could be overwritten when the importing package contains
content item with the same key.
If set to `false`, always create new content item under the specified container regardless of the content key.

parameters.name: ignoreDataLossWarnings
parameters.description: Updates the content type even though the changes might result in data loss.

parameters.name: locale
parameters.description:
Specifies the locale in which content item in that locale will be imported. If no locale is defined
then content in all locales are imported.

get.description: List all property formats using the provided options.
Get the property format with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the property format to retrieve.

parameters.name: allowDeleted
parameters.description: Indicates that a deleted property format may be returned.

get.description: List property groups using the provided options.

parameters.name: sources
parameters.description:
Indicates which property groups sources that should be listed.
Use All to include groups from all sources or
Default to include groups without a specific sources.

requestBody.description: The property group that should be created.

get.description: Get the property group with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the property group to retrieve.

put.description:
Create or replace a property group. If a property group with the provided key exist it is replaced.
Otherwise a new property group is created.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the property group to update or create.

requestBody.description: The values of the created or replaced property group.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the property group to patch.

requestBody.description: The values of the property group that should be updated.

delete.description: Deletes the property group with the provided key.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The key of the property group to delete.

BinaryProperty.description: Describes a property that can contain a reference to binary data.

BooleanProperty.description: Describes a property that can contain a boolean value.

key.description: The unique key of this Changeset.

created.description: A timestamp indicating when this changeset was first created.

createdBy.description: The username of the user that created this changeset.

Changeset.description: Changesets are used to group work on several content items together.

ChangesetItem.description: Items in an changeset that contains a link to the specific content version.

items.description: The items in this paged collection.

pageIndex.description: The zero-based index of the current page.

pageSize.description: The number of item in each page. Not necessarily the same as the number of items in this page.

totalItemCount.description: The estimated total number of items in the collection. May be omitted if the total item count is unknown.

totalItemCount.description: The estimated total number of items in the collection. May be omitted if the total item count is unknown.

contentType.description: The key of the ContentType that this ComponentListItem can contain.

ComponentListItem.description: Describes a property list item that can contain a component instance of a specific type.

contentType.description: The key of the ContentType that this ComponentProperty can contain.

ComponentProperty.description: Describes a property that can contain a component instance of a specific type.

CompositionBehavior.description: Represent a Composition behavior for a ContentType.

ContentBaseType.description: Represent the base type of a ContentType.

name.description: The name of the content component. If Reference is set, the name is automatically set to the name of the referenced content.

displayOption.description: An optional display option for the content component.

segmentationGroup.description: An optional group for the personalizable component.

segments.description: Specifies the settings for the content component.

contentType.description: The key of the content type that this is an embedded instance of.

content.description: Dictionary with all custom properties as specified by associated ContentType

properties.description: Properties as they are defined by corresponding component or content type.

key.description: The key that identifies this content item.

locale.description: The locale of this content instance.

version.description: The version identifier of this content instance.

contentType.description: The content type of this content item.

displayName.description: The display name of this content item.

published.description: Indicates a time when this content was published or should be published.

expired.description: Indicates a time when this content expired or should expire.

delayPublishUntil.description: Indicates a time when this content version should transition to published status. Must only be assigned when Status is set to Scheduled.

container.description: The key that identifies the container content that this content item belongs to.

owner.description: The key that identifies the owner of this content. Content that is own by another content is also known as an asset.

routeSegment.description: A string that represents the segment that should be used when routing or generate routes to the current content instance.

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of the user that made the latest modification to this content instance.

ContentItem.description: Represents a version of a content item.

contentTypes.description: The content types that are used by the content items in the response.

pageIndex.description: The zero-based index of the current page.

pageSize.description: The number of item in each page. Not necessarily the same as the number of items in this page.

totalItemCount.description: The estimated total number of items in the collection. May be omitted if the total item count is unknown.

hasItems.description: Indicates if the content contains any content items.

key.description: The key that identifies this ContentType.

displayName.description: The display name of this ContentType.

source.description: A string that is used to indicate the source of this ContentType.

sortOrder.description: An value that is used to when sorting ContentType instances.

features.description:
Provides a set of features that content based on this ContentType supports.
This value is assigned based on the BaseType and cannot be modified.

usage.description: Specifies how this ContentType can be used.

mayContainTypes.description: Provides a set of content types that can be created in container of this type

compositionBehaviors.description: Provides a set of composition behaviors specifying how this content type can be used within compositions.

created.description: A timestamp indicating when this ContentType was first created.

lastModified.description: Indicates the last time this content type was modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: The username of the user that made the latest modification to this ContentType.

additionalProperties.description: Describes a property of a ContentType in the CMS.

properties.description: Dictionary with all custom properties of this ContentType.

format.description: The key of the PropertyFormat that this ContentTypeProperty is an instance of.

displayName.description: The display name of this ContentTypeProperty.

localized.description:
Indicates if a property instance of this type should be localized for each locale

required.description: Indicates if a property instance of this type must always be assigned a value.

group.description:

sortOrder.description: An value that is used to when sorting ContentTypeProperty instances.

editor.description: Editor used for managing this property.

allowDeleted.description: Indicates if deleted content could be used as source.

container.description: Optional key of the container where the copied content should be placed.

owner.description: Optional key of the owner where the copied content should be placed.

keepPublishedStatus.description: Indicates if published versions of the content should keep their published status rather than being created as a draft version at the destination.
